statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 3 \\ -4 \\ -1 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 1 \\ 3 \\ -2 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 8 \\ -5 \\ -2 \\ 5 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -29 \\ 19 \\ 5 \\ -18 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 0 \\ 3 \\ -3 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 0 \\ 3 \\ -3 \\ -4 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
